Text:
After the Bushin Festival in the kingdom, Annerose
fervently practices her swordsmanship in a forest
near a certain town.
Huff... Hyah! Hmph...!
(Faster, and deadlier...!)
Quite dedicated, aren't you?

You dare to approach someone wielding a sword from
behind? Don't complain if I cut you down...Goldy
Gilded.

You knew I was here all along, didn't you? A former
member of Velgalta's Seven Blades would, after all.

That said, what's got you training alone in a place
like this? Weren't you just at the martial arts
tournament?

The importance of training has been ingrained in me
since those days. The way of the sword requires
relentless effort. And besides...
I have extra energy since I didn't get to fight you.

Come on, now. Are you that upset I withdrew from the
semi-finals?

Thanks to me, you advanced to the finals. I'd expect
gratitude, not complaints.

You were defeated by Mundane in the Bushin Festival,
ending your streak as the Unbeaten Legend. Doesn't
that bother you at all?

If you had more ambition, you could reach even
greater heights.
Greater heights, huh...

Use your experience of defeat to ascend higher. I've
also moved forward by admitting my own weaknesses.

Don't you want to become stronger like Mundane, who
showed us such a magnificent battle?

Mundane... That guy is beyond exceptional. After
seeing his swordplay, I lost all will to win.

But tell me... Do you seriously think your steady
effort will get you to his level?
Well...

(I vowed to reach Mundane's level someday after
seeing his artful swordplay. That's why I joined
today's tournament, but...)

(After seeing what he's capable of, nothing feels
satisfying. Can I really catch up to Mundane like
this...?)
Whoops! Did I say too much?

I'll be wracked with guilt if you lose the finals
later today.

Don't worry. There's no way I'll lose here.
Thanks for your concern, Goldy Gilded.

You don't get sarcasm, do you...? Well, do your
best.

Yes, of course. If you have that much faith in me,
I must live up to your expectations.
That's not what I... Ah, forget it! Suit yourself!

The final battle ensues, and it is over in an
instant...
...Huh?
(It's over already...?)

A decisive victory for Annerose... Well, that
figures.

(It's not on the level of the Bushin Festival, but
it's still the finals of a dark knight tournament.
For it to end this easily...)

(If I continue with these lukewarm battles, will I
ever catch up to him...?)
(No, of course not. I)
(I want to become stronger!)
...I have an announcement to make.

Though I have been crowned the victor, it's far from
enough.

I am...seeking challengers! If you're confident in
your skills, come and face me!
What the... What's she on about...?

And so, Annerose Nichtsehen loudly proclaims her call
for challengers...
